body_content.explanation: a dish made with pieces of bread cut or broken into small pieces, mixed with milk and egg and other ingredients such as sugar, spices, fruit, or vegetables, that is firm and solid enough to cut when it is baked:
examples: You can buy slabs of home-made bread pudding from the market to eat straight from the paper bag while walking home.
The pork was served with autumn squash bread pudding.

body_content.explanation: a sweet, soft baked dish made with pieces of bread soaked (= left to get very wet) in egg and milk or cream, and other ingredients such as sugar, dried fruits, or spices:
examples: Dessert was warm bread pudding topped with whipped cream.
